website_summaries.verdict: A great game at a budget price for 3DS that delivers a sense of nostalgia and great multiplayer gameplay on a small device.
pros: The game is fully wireless and Internet compatible for multiplayer competitive gameplay
Most classic and modern characters are selectable as drivers
Good vehicle physics with familiar powers and characteristics
cons: New updates may have a slight learning curve for new and returning Kart players

customer_reviews.title: Great game, great price, great stories to make with friends.
customer_reviews.text: Plays perfectly. Came with the red game case and I loved that so much. I ordered 2. One for me and one for my ex girlfriend to give to her on her birthday since she loves mario kart(maybe so much so to dump me ;u;). I look forward to racing anyone else who owns a 3ds through download play, the thing where only one person needs a copy of the game to race against 7 more players who don't. I even look forward to racing my ex because she is a rambungcious gal who is awesome and is awesome at MK.
customer_reviews.author: enrique

customer_reviews.title: Bought this and when I received I did not have ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and when I received I did not have original la lagging and game card had sharpie writing on it. I thought was buying new not used.
customer_reviews.author: M1

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun, perfect game for the 2ds/3ds.
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun and challenging. My son is a HUGE Mario Kart fan, and just received a 2ds for his birthday. So this game seemed like the perfect gift for him. We already have Mario Kart 8 at home, and I was worried that this was going to be too similar to that and not provide enough fun for my son. Boy, was I wrong. There are a few different levels, different karts, and different challenges to overcome in this game. If you are a Mario Kart fan and own a 2ds or a 3ds, I would highly recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: chipskip05

customer_reviews.title: Mario Kart Wii levels of competition, Mario Kart: Double Dash levels of fun when playing online. A near-perfect blend!
customer_reviews.text: As a lifelong Nintendo player, this game went where Mario Kart 8 failed for competitive games. It struck a great balance between casual players and hardcore players, and I love this title for it. Mario Kart 8 went overboard with the casual experience, alienating a lot of competitive players with its worsened drifting mechanics. Nintendo representatives, if you're reading this, I implore you to bring the next Mario Kart closer to this. Casual AND hardcore gamers can both enjoy a balanced engine like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ainn

customer_reviews.title: Childhood all over again!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. I bought my with the 3DS for her birthday as she always wanted one. Was able to give her this game for almost 10$ cheaper than the store. I ended up playing it more than she did and it is fantastic. It's been a while since I have played a hand held system and this game was flawless and brought me back to my childhood with gameboys. Graphics are as good as the home system. Thanks Nintendo you are the best! Also if you can release 8 for the 3DS that would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Krazy with a K

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game! We have Mario Kart 8 for Wii U, and love that game. This is the portable version for 3DS. My kids (teenagers) love it, so I got myself one too (yes . . . I have a 3DS). It is great for passing the time in waiting rooms and such, and is a fun game. Since we like it so well, I also bought one for my 8 year old nephew and he was absolutely ecstatic. There are different courses, different characters to play with, different motorcycles and karts to choose from. Some of the characters and vehicles need to be unlocked. Like all things Mario, there are many different challenges to keep things interesting.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: A nice substitute
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son because he is in love with Mario racing games. He also has MarioKart on the Wii and Wii U. While he enjoys this game, I definitely think he enjoys his Wii U version much more (probably because of the downloadable content). This is a game he likes but not one that he continuously asks for. His favorite part is seeing all of the unlocked karts and characters that didn't make it onto MarioKart8. I think MarioKart is one of those games that will always translate better on a tv screen rather than on a handheld device.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Gameplay is a good balance between action and speed
customer_reviews.text: Gameplay is a good balance between action and speed, with cup runs taking about 10 to 15 minutes. Customization is fantastic and the new maps are awesome. Half the cups are classic maps form all over the franchise, including the original Rainbow Road (That's right, The Nemesis is back!). Best part was unlocking Mirror Mode, where the maps are reversed adding a nice challenge to the maps you already raced to death. Online play is solid and allows for local multiplayer using only one copy of the game. As God Intended.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher C. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game for all Mario fans
customer_reviews.text: A game that at the time was about $45 everywhere for $30.12 on amazon! Talk about a good deal. Got this as a gift and the kid I gave it to really enjoyed it. I have since bought a copy of it for my younger brother and also played the game myself. There is nostalgia in playing as it brings back memories of the classic Mario Kart games with an updated spin to it. The new levels, characters and arenas are great, this would be a great game for any Mario franchise fan or 3DS owner. I sure enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Marciaita

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a 7 year old and I have played it myself as well. Both of us love the game and have a great time playing it. We can even play together if we have two devices!
customer_reviews.author: Checkers

customer_reviews.title: Can't stop playing it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this game so much. Mario kart has always been one of my favorite games. Ever since i got this game my ps4 has been crying since i use him less now lol. If you guys love mario kart i would recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Gives new life to an old classic.
customer_reviews.text: I loved Mario Kart on the Super Nintendo and the one released for N64, so I figured I'd give this one a shot since I don't have many games for my 3DS yet. I'm so glad I did. It remains faithful to its roots, while still managing to keep it fresh and innovative with new course designs, car customization, global wifi, unlockable characters, and of course, 3D graphics. I love the fact that you can play on courses from previous Mario Kart games that have been polished and completely updated graphics-wise. Gameplay is simple to grasp, but super addictive and challenging to master. Mario Kart 7 has rekindled my love of the series, and my 3DS.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Mario Kart 7
customer_reviews.text: Alright, if you don't know that Mario Kart 7 is worth buying, then you've never played Mario Kart before. Hands down, this series is the best racing series ever made. It makes Need For Speed look like a pile of puke! Pole Position WISHED it could be a streak from Mario's tire. If you like Mario (who was so cool, he went from jumping over barrels against Donkey Kong, to being the Mickey Mouse and Sonic the Hedgehog of Nintendo). Not only can you fly in this version, but you still get to blow things up.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought preowned great condition only a rip in the cover which my kids throw out anyway so great purchase game works great a lot cheaper then buying new
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and works great. Better tha n paying full price!
customer_reviews.author: Kewanee Joe

customer_reviews.title: I love Mario.
customer_reviews.text: I love Mario.. and I love Mario Kart, however, for some reason this game is forever ejecting out of my 3DS even when not being physically ejected or even touched after putting the game in.. I have to remove it 3 times before my 3DS recognizes that the game is even in the system.. I don't know whats going on.. I've never had a problem purchasing 3DS games from amazon before and this doesn't happen with any of the games that I have purchased with amazon except this one..
customer_reviews.author: Taira A Cangro

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got this game for my 3DS and it’s a lot of fun! Price was still too high for a game that’s been out this long.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmeen Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Mario, Luigi, Princess Peach Oh My!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love a great time once in a while? With this game you will have hours of fun. Whether for the kiddos or your very own guilty pleasure the levels and characters really bring back the feeling of being in front of your Super NES or even better Nintendo. If you are on the go and would like an alternative to being stuck on social media I suggest grabbing/purchasing yourself a 3DS and this game an give yourself some down time with Mario and the gang!
customer_reviews.author: CandySoso_

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great game for both kids and adults. Fun and challenging with high replay value for both single player as well as multiplayer Online multiplayer works flawlessly. Local multiplayer is fantastic requiring only 1 person own the game which can be shared with other player's 3DS via local wifi. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Little brother loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my brother who just got a 3DS he was very happy and played this game all the time
customer_reviews.author: corrine

customer_reviews.title: Not for USA consoles
customer_reviews.text: The Mario Kart 7 I received was for Saudi Arabia consoles. I didn’t even check to see if it worked in our DS first. I returned it ASAP. We were really excited for this because our son loves Mario Kart on the Wii, so we figured he’d like this for his birthday. Bummer I had to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Fits into the series perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I have played and actually own every Mario Kart game to date, (even though the first one came out the year I was born...), and this one fits in perfectly with the series. The new gliding and submersible aspects of the game make for far more varied levels and the transitions are smooth and the sectioned races are a blast! In those handful of sectioned races, rather than finishing by completing laps, you complete sections allowing for a much longer and more varied course. This game is seriously fun and does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Good condition works fine
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly fine, no damage. It was a Birthday gift for my son. He has had lots of fun playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie and Joshua Gough

customer_reviews.title: Old Skewl Gamers and New School Gamers will appreciate this!
customer_reviews.text: This game is fantastic! I used to play Mario Kart for SNES and now my kids play it. This version stays true to the original and adds some great detail that makes the game fun and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Etzcorn

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: I love playing this game, but I would suggest purchasing a Nintendo Switch and buying Mario kart for it (if you can afford it). But this game is great, has a lot of tracks, and free online unlike the switch!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P

customer_reviews.title: Good game.
customer_reviews.text: Its a fun kart racing game, it only has 8 playable characters, you unlock more characters once you beat 150cc, You can play online with other people too and yes there are people still playing this game online. Im enjoying this game.
customer_reviews.author: Art Molina

customer_reviews.title: Kart Racing Madness On The Go
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart 7 is exactly what you would expect from a Mario Kart game and more. It has the familiar Grand Prix, Time Trial, and Battle Modes you know and love and some interesting racers. The newest features include kart customization and the ability to drive underwater and glide. Get ready for some kart racing action unlike any other in the series.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Buy
customer_reviews.text: I played Mariokart when when it was released on N64. I figured this is a great gift for my little nephew. I could have bee more right. He plays this games so much and loves it that his parents have to limit how much he plays it. First time they have had to do that for a video game he has. I loved this when I was a kid and my nephew surely loves it. Great game
customer_reviews.author: Evin

customer_reviews.title: Great racing game for my kids
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting my 5 yr old to like the game so much. Since DS is on it's last lifecycle. This game is a must to have as the only fun racing game even it is repeated tracks. Both my 9 and 5 yr old love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and the recipients were very pleased with it. It saw a great deal of use.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Schuler

customer_reviews.title: perfect for anyone
customer_reviews.text: we bought this game for my son, I have always been a fan of Nintendo but they have impressed me once again. the graphics and playability are perfectly scaled down for the system. my son who is 3 has no problem with the controls from start up through actual gameplay. this game is easily enjoyed by anyone at any age and the connection to play from system to system cant be beat. this purchase is by far my favorite from this entire holiday season. if you get this for your child or yourself you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: YtsimRan

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game!
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived is new, wrapped condition. The game is a favorite in our household. The children love the different choices and action of the characters. This is a repeat purchase as the prior game was misplaced. The child was so upset we purchased another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: ems5117

customer_reviews.title: I knew MarioKart 7 was a great game to play with others but experiencing the 3D ...
customer_reviews.text: I knew MarioKart 7 was a great game to play with others but experiencing the 3D effects are amazing on your 3DS
customer_reviews.author: Krysten Ordaz

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift but played it myself and was enjoyable
customer_reviews.author: Josselyn Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Classic karting
customer_reviews.text: I had fun for a few hours with Mario Kart 7, completing all the 150cc cups and almost all the mirror cups. I really love that they included classic levels from past Mario Kart games. Not my favorite 3DS game and it didn't capture me like Super Circuit did on GBA, but then again that might just be the nostalgia goggles.
customer_reviews.author: mkultra

customer_reviews.title: Classic cart game.
customer_reviews.text: Great kids game. Keeps them occupied for a decent amount of time. Enjoyable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game, lives up to its predecessors!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love all Mario games and this one does not disappoint! I purchased a 3DS mainly to play this game and I am so glad I did. My favorite thing about this game is the fact that it is so familiar while still being different from the previous games! If you are on the fence about buying it, do it!!! Once you beat the entire game like I did you can always race with your friends and even complete strangers (and who doesn't like to beat someone you don't even know online?).
customer_reviews.author: Kale

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I was racing on oddly-simple roads and tracks
customer_reviews.text: A decent little racer, if a little bland in some of the tracks. I felt like I was racing on oddly-simple roads and tracks, not a lot of vibrant life in them like most of nintendo's works, but overall it's not a bad game, as I find myself playing it every now and again to see what I can unlock. I just hope it gets better than it's beginnings.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Mario Kart games, seriously. Played this in middle school and destroyed all the kids, it was awesome
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Graphics aren't the best.
customer_reviews.text: good game, I don't use it though I got the wrong one lol. Graphics aren't the best.
customer_reviews.author: omara

customer_reviews.title: Just not quite 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Another game that got a lot of play time right away. Eventually they got bored with it though and paying forty bucks for this seems a little steep for how repetitive it is.
customer_reviews.author: StoneHenge

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: Of course my son loved what Santa got him. Plays with after he finishes his schoolwork. Seller sent quickly.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Great game for the 3DS
customer_reviews.text: What more is there to say about this legendary series. It looks great, controls well, and overall is just a blast to play. A staple in the 3DS library.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our autistic son who loves Mario Kart Racing for his DS and he is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Donto & Amy

customer_reviews.title: go-to game EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: Forever my favorite game. No game wins this for its addictiveness. Hands down my personal go-to game EVERYWHERE. I can play it on the bus, subway, walking(not crossing roads though, beware) and killing time because a challenge takes abt 3 mins to 6 mins(Grand Prix). ALL the courses are BEAUTIFUL. Some are redesigned and some are new. Love all the new courses! and how we can use our own characters to play in the game! ^^ Cute racing game. Wont regret the money spent on this.
customer_reviews.author: Supeng

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this game , great price , quick shipping , hard to find in stores
customer_reviews.author: TCoonan

customer_reviews.title: Used version works as well as new.
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Still some saved avatar info from previous user but nothing personal. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect
customer_reviews.text: This game comes so close to the ideal Mario kart game. The game runs smoothly, looks great and the physics are some of the best. It has great additions to the series like underwater and air segments and items. It also keeps all great things like tricks and the fixed drifts. It updates aspects like the blue shell has a great character roster and retro track selection. My only complaint is no custom races like in Mario kart ds with teams and more than 4 races.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Adame

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game, Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing game that every 3DS owner should have, you can even play with friends who don't own the game! The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars it's because it's very short, You can finish all the races and unlock most parts in a day. That's just the nature of car games; and you could have fun for months /years with friends and online, I just wish it had more tracks or something.
customer_reviews.author: Zeriel

customer_reviews.title: A worthy successor to Mario Kart Wii
customer_reviews.text: If you've been itching for additional levels after mastering Mario Kart Wii, and just happen to have a 3DS, get this! You will get: 3D Functionality 16 New Courses 16 Fun Retro levels New Items (Super Leaf. Fire Flower, etc.) Cart Customization Online functionality Did I mention 3D Functionality? This is truly a great deal, especially since the price just dropped to $29!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Guidry

customer_reviews.title: BEST Mario Kart Ever
customer_reviews.text: I was a huge fan of Mario Kart 64. I played several of them after that but none of them held the same magic for me that Mario Kart 64 had...until now. Mario Kart 7 is perfection in the world of Mario Kart games. The single player campaign is a perfect blend of old and new tracks and the online play is very well done. I have enjoyed WAY too many hours of this game, and I'll enjoy many more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Frandsen

customer_reviews.title: Missing a lot of features that made the MKDS better.
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart Ds was so much betters, this was kind of a letdown for sure. Missing a lot of features that made the MKDS better.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Own a 2DS or 3DS?  You should have this game already!
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Mario Kart 7. There are so many nuances to this game, and provides many hours of fun. Especially if you're into unlocking all the racers.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Though this was not the game I bought a 2ds for recently, it is the only one I have really played! It brings so many memories as it has some snes, n64, and gc courts, plus some new ones. It is kinda hard to get online to play but you can make it happen in the end. Despite my liking other karting games in other consoles, Mario Kart is the best one. This is a must have for any 3 and 2 DS owner!
customer_reviews.author: Elias M

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for us (long distance couple)
customer_reviews.text: My bf and I are long distance and race each other every time we video chat. A great way to spend time with each other and have fun! Although it does get competitive at times haha
customer_reviews.author: Thereesa

customer_reviews.title: Another great Mario Kart game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for my 3DS being an avid Mario Kart player. The game itself is fantastic, you can read all sorts of reviews or watch gameplay on YouTube if you want. The game came packaged in perfect condition, just like if I had bought it at GameStop or Best Buy. Since the top Nintendo games don't go on sale all that often, if you can get it for $30, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: epenn28

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Amazing graphics for an 8 year old game. I was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: KiryuDojima

customer_reviews.title: great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games out there for nintendo hours and hours of fun great for kids and adults if you don't like it, you probably just suck at the game haha
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I rated this game as high as I did, because the gift was for my seven year old nephew. His birthday wasn't until May. He loves the game. I wanted him to have a game that my brothers and I grew up playing as kids. Super Mario Bros is not as violent as most of the games today and I wanted him to have a kid friendly game. So thank you. He loves it and I'm the best auntie in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Redd

customer_reviews.title: Another really good version of Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: It's another excellent addition to the Mario Kart series. With the added effect of 3D and when viewing them on the N3DS XL, the game is visually stunning. Upgrades are given to you at random at every 50 coins you collect when you're out on the track, crushing your foes.
customer_reviews.author: Francois M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun MK Game
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most fun Mariokart game that I have played. One of the few games that I actually play in 3D. I think there should be more levels but when you are going for the maximum stars on every board it ends up working out.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite games for 3DS by far! So much fun to play against friends or even online. It has a lot of different characters for you to play as and even more options to build your kart to different specs. It has new courses and old courses from previous MarioKart games on other systems. Recommend this to any Mario fan. Very fun.
customer_reviews.author: tynick

customer_reviews.title: fun game
customer_reviews.text: mario cart is a game you never get sick of
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big change from the original mario kart
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased Mario Kart 7 on Amazon and it was exactly what I expected. Competitive racing with all your favorite characters including your mii character, Silver mario, lakimu (the guy that picks you up when you fall off a cliff), Honey bee queen and more! You can race worldwide like on wii and you also have the Mario kart channel. This game is very fun and will forever be a classic . This game is for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: My 7yo LOVES this game!!!
customer_reviews.text: He's played the whole thing through about 4 times. He loves it. He is just now starting to get bored of it many months later. Very age appropriate! Very cool graphics and very fun. I love that he loves it too :) I wanted him to love other "deeper" games, but why fight the obvious?!? One heck of a happy Dad! Totally recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: William H. Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun game.
customer_reviews.text: For those who played MarioKart back in the day, this will bring you back. Honestly, I haven't played many of the other versions besides the original... But I was pleasantly surprised to see Rainbow Road again. I actually bought this for my boyfriend, but we both play it. We both like it!
customer_reviews.author: Keni

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and fun!
customer_reviews.text: The game is great! Not much to really say, but its a very fun racing game with up to 8 players online worlwide, with friends, or in communities, along with various kart customization! (Choose the Kart, wheels, and glider) Though the unlocking method is by getting coins and unlocking everything takes a while. Plus, what you unlock when you reach a certain amount of coins is random. All in all, I recommend this game to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: MK7 has quickly become my favorite Mario Kart game in the series
customer_reviews.text: MK7 has quickly become my favorite Mario Kart game in the series. With challenging tracks, cool easter eggs and many customization options on carts, this game is great to play by yourself or with friends. With download and play, anyone with a 3DS can join into the fun, making it much more appealing since I don't need to buy multiple copies to play with my friends / family. It's also great to settle arguments.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Do people really give a negative review of Mario? ...
customer_reviews.text: Do people really give a negative review of Mario? I'm a grown adult and I still would play it even though I'm not used to small screens. I had the first Nintendo system when they came out (I'm showing my age), but you can't go wrong with Mario.
customer_reviews.author: MParker

customer_reviews.title: great Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fun new addition to the Mario Kart series. It's online racing community system makes for hours of entertainment. A lot of new additions since the DS version and the 3D is used reasonably as well. It is very similar to Mario Kart DS though, so if you did not care for that game then you probably will not enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: Yemaya A.

customer_reviews.title: Fun racing game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, even though I'm pretty bad at all racing games I still always enjoy Mario Kart.
customer_reviews.author: DarkDolphin7990

customer_reviews.title: 3D Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: I'd say this is pretty much what you would expect. Mario Kart in 3D with online racing, although I haven't done any racing online. Not to much to say really; most of the game should seem familiar to veterans and of course there are new levels added. Lot's of fun and I still laugh from time to time watching stray shells collide with unsuspecting racers.
customer_reviews.author: demonsRendangered

customer_reviews.title: my sons fight over who gets to play this game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun that my sons fight over who gets to play this game!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Dear Penthouse...
customer_reviews.text: I finally know how to actually play Mario Kart now. No more not being able to play 150cc.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Invidian

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my granddaughter, and it was such a big hit, ,,I had to buy 5 more 3dsxl consoles so my whole family could play together. Soooo much fun, love the sound effects,...and we never get tired of playing
customer_reviews.author: Linda delp

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Don't sleep on this baby! This game has levels from the Wii and N64 Mario Karts along with some original levels. The gameplay is tight, the graphics are clean and crisp and the music is typically enjoyable fare from Nintendo. Bought this for $30.
customer_reviews.author: CollegeStudentJJL

customer_reviews.title: It's Mario kart
customer_reviews.text: This gem is just as good as all of them. You'll be at the end of a race and get blue shelled and hit by 3 kinds of nonsense and get 5th. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: DontFeedAfter10

customer_reviews.title: I bought two and one came in perfect condition and the other won’t read and we tried ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and one came in perfect condition and the other won’t read and we tried on three different 3DSs.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: It's fun to play with someone on multiplayer
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart 7 is a good game. I'd give it a 7 or 8 out of 10. Unlocking the parts in the game is fun and challenging. The real challenge is on online multiplayer, you could either race against some people that are easy or some that are experts like me lol. It does get repetitive when you are trying to get VR points in online multiplayer and you could be playing for hours online so it's good and overall its a good game to play with friends :)
customer_reviews.author: B.R.E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Addition to a Classic Series
customer_reviews.text: Solid addition to the series. Nothing groundbreaking as it is a Mario Kart game but this will totally provide that classic Mario kart competition between you and friends. Also notably harder than some earlier games which adds a level of fun. Character selection kind of weak, though nothing that takes away from the game
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: I have played Mario Kart for years. This was the first version I bought my son and it was a hit. Love Mario Kart.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: This game is excellent. A lot of different tracks and cars to ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is excellent. A lot of different tracks and cars to choose from for any taste. It is also very challenging.
customer_reviews.author: RWM

customer_reviews.title: Mario Kart gets the 3-D treatment
customer_reviews.text: My 3 sons under the age of 10 enjoyed plaing Mario Kart on the wii. When the youngest got a 3-DS For Christmas he begged for this game and even ended up offering his Christmas $ toward it. I caved And it is by far his favorite. I was suprised by how cool the graphics were. Playing regular DS games on his 3ds just seems a little borring comparatively.
customer_reviews.author: Tokolowitz

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to the franchise
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart has been one of my favorite video game series since my Super Nintendo days. While Double Dash remains my favorite MK--too many hours racing Dad for that to likely ever change--MK 7 is a solid addition to the franchise. Kart customizations are cool, especially the new gliders. The tracks are a standard mix of new and retro tracks, and the characters also are fairly standard. Overall, MK 7 doesn't stray far from what's worked in the past, and that's fine by me.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkwing

customer_reviews.title: It just gets better and better
customer_reviews.text: Since mario kart arrived on handhelds device on gameboy advanced the game play has really improved. i loved mario kart DS. But mario kart 3ds is just an improvement. the online is a whole lot more stable. more chaacters and carts to choose from and the graphics are great. there is nothing bad i can say about this game. its mario kart and its fun.
customer_reviews.author: zelda88

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter was thrilled to received this with her 3DS for ...
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter was thrilled to received this with her 3DS for Christmas. Only puts it down to go to school and bed. She loves it! Grandma made a home run with this game!
customer_reviews.author: Easy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Hey, its Mario Kart. You can't go wrong with this game. I like the ability to race people I pass with streetpass as well. That's a lot of fun and adds a little bit of a social aspect to the game.
customer_reviews.author: K Tippett

customer_reviews.title: Mario kart is a classic.
customer_reviews.text: There are no stupid gimmicks. It's Mario kart. The graphics are good and online play is the best thing to happen to Mario kart since red turtle shells.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Another great Mario Kart!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm hooked on this game! Love that they finally took out that stupid lighting that you had to pass on to another player from Mario Kart Wii and the love the levels that go on until the end and you just don't repeat laps. The glider is a lot of fun too! Underwater is ok but luckily there aren't a lot of those parts in the game. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kobeskillz

customer_reviews.title: Good game for both adult and my 4 year old son
customer_reviews.text: Who don't like racing right? It's a good game especially with all the different arcade style. I bought it for my son's 4th B-day, he still a bit young to manage the controls on the Nintendo 3DS XL but will grow into this game in no time. Highly recommend it.. although nothing to compare to as this is first game purchase for the console.
customer_reviews.author: Hue Chau

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my girlfriend to be able to play something on my 3DS because she doesn't like super smash bros, pokemon, or fire emblem. She loved this game on the Wii, the old game, and she really likes this game on the 3DS. Every time I'm with her somewhere, and I'm not using my 3DS, she always begs me to let her take it out and play mario kart.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time playing any Mario Kart game... and all I can say is.. Why haven't I played this before! OMG, so much fun, one of the best games out there! Great graphics and game play! I'm now hooked on Mario Kart!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Another great family game if you can"t get your kids off of the technology. Easy for parents, Aunts, Uncles, even Grandparents to play along with your kids. No you might have to suck it up and not be in the winners circle, but you can get lucky at times. SO if you want a game to interact with the kids buy this one!!
customer_reviews.author: mrs handy 101

customer_reviews.title: loves it!
customer_reviews.text: grandson loves it, he is 7 and that's all that matters
customer_reviews.author: embroidery2014

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Fun
customer_reviews.text: This version of Mario Kart is the most fun version I've played yet. I love the underwater courses, and the addition of gliding through the air. The online feature works fantastic, I haven't had a problem with lag so far. I would highly recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: (Yet)Another good Mario Kart game.
customer_reviews.text: I can't think of a series more universally loved than Mario Kart. The new 3DS sequel, Mario Kart 7, retains all the intense racing craziness, while adding new and interesting ideas to the mix, such as gliding through the air, and racing underwater. Tons of new, obscure characters(some odd choices by Nintendo), new items, new innovative tracks, and online racing(although the game has very modest online capabilities,) make this MK7 a solid choice for a 3DS title. The 3D graphics are nice, and add little flair to the visuals. Although the game feels VERY familiar, its still very fun.
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite MarioKart game.
customer_reviews.text: It's my favorite installment in the MarioKart series (I don't really like 8). It's especially amazing because you get to see your favorite mario characters in 3D (unless you have the 2DS). Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMoose

customer_reviews.title: Good game but...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I wish it had a few more modes though like single player racing whereby you can select the tracks you want to race without having to do an entire cup. The kart speeds could be a little faster. They feel very slow.
customer_reviews.author: chancy319

customer_reviews.title: I love this game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game! The clues are great and this game is challenging at times. I think this would be perfect for an adult or a child. I highly recommend this game

customer_reviews.text: I like very much this product. You could game online for any gamer fron the world, and with your friends too. I dont like that does not have mission mode how the Wii version. The game have very good graphics and sound. The MK7 channel is regular and the comunities are so so too. I will prefer more option and customization
customer_reviews.author: gustavo

product_meta.title: Mario Kart 7
product_meta.description: The newest installment of the fan-favorite Mario Kart franchise brings Mushroom Kingdom racing fun into glorious 3D. For the first time, drivers explore new competitive kart possibilities, such as soaring through the skies or plunging to the depths of the sea. New courses, strategic new abilities and customizable karts bring the racing excitement to new heights.
feature_bullets: Players can compete in local wireless matches or online over a broadband Internet connection.
The game supports both SpotPass and StreetPass features.Compatible with the 3DS

Players can show their own style by customizing their vehicles with accessories that give them a competitive advantage. For instance, giant tires help a kart drive off-road, while smaller tires work best on city courses.
People can choose to race as one of their favorite Mushroom Kingdom characters or even as their Mii character.

The Mario Kart franchise continues to evolve. New kart abilities add to the wild fun that the games are known for. On big jumps, a kart deploys a wing to let it glide over a track shortcut. When under water, a propeller pops out to help the kart cruise across the sea floor.
